lines.text: I'm in love with a man whom I dislike intensely, who'd cheat me, who'd lie to me, whom I wouldn't trust as far as I could throw the Queen Mary. I...
You... you don't mean me, do you?

lines.character: Silas Jenkins, Justice of the Peace

lines.text: Couple'a chumps on the way, wanna get hitched.
lines.character: Silas Jenkins, Justice of the Peace

lines.text: Why not? you caught me at half-past two in the morning in a weak moment.
lines.character: Silas Jenkins, Justice of the Peace

lines.text: What are you crying for, darling?
Mr. Jenkins, I don't want to embarrass you, but they really want to get married first.
Oh, I see, sparring for your liberty, eh? Well, I don't blame you, I don't blame you...
lines.character: Silas Jenkins, Justice of the Peace

lines.text: Why yes, she helped me out with my pants this evening.
